# Open Source Polkadot Stack <!-- omit in toc -->

The goal of this page is to provide an overview of the open-source Polkadot/Kusama Tech Stack.

This is a living document and we are relying on our community to contribute to it and help maintain
it. [**Please feel free to make edits and additions via pull requests**](#contributing). We
apologize if we missed your project!

---

- [About](#about)
- [Layers of Polkadot Stack](#layers-of-polkadot-stack)
  - [User Interface](#user-interface)
  - [Tools, APIs and Languages](#tools-apis-and-languages)
  - [ink Smart Contracts](#ink-smart-contracts)
  - [Chains and Pallets](#chains-and-pallets)
  - [Host](#host)
  - [Network Maintenance Tools](#network-maintenance-tools)
  - [Signatures](#signatures)
  - [Consensus](#consensus)
  - [Networking](#networking)
- [Contributing](#contributing)

## About

The Polkadot Tech Stack is a subset of the Web 3.0 Tech Stack, which consists of the **open-source**
technologies contributing to and relying on [Polkadot](https://polkadot.network/),
[Kusama](https://kusama.network/) and [Substrate](https://substrate.dev/). It is meant to be used
for decentralized application (Dapp) development within numerous verticals including DeFi, Gaming,
Provenance and many others not pictured below.

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD040 -->

```
|------|--------|------------|
| DeFi | Gaming | Provenance |
|______|________|____________|
            Dapps
|--------------------------/-|
| Explorers, Wallets      /  |
|------------------------/---|
| Tools, Apis, Languages/    |
|----------------------/-----|
| 2nd layer protocols /      |
|--------------------/-------|
| Chains            /  other |
|------------------/---    --|
| *Polkadot*      |   tech   |
|------------------\---------|
| P2P, Crypto, Wasm \        |
|--------------------\-------|
```

## Layers of Polkadot Stack

In the below sections you can find a list of different layers of the Polkadot Stack.

**Maintenance Status**:

- 游릭 Actively maintained
- 游리 Stale (no activity for 1 month)
- 游댮 Unmaintained (no activity for more than 3 months)

### User Interface

| Components             | Existing projects                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Potentially interesting projects                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Desktop/Web Wallets    | [polkadot-js/apps](https://github.com/polkadot-js/apps) 游릭, [Talisman Web Application](https://github.com/TalismanSociety/talisman-web) 游릭, [AirGap](https://github.com/airgap-it/airgap-wallet) 游리, [Primis](https://github.com/Primis-Labs/client) 游릭, [Sakura](https://github.com/w3finance/sakura) 游댮, [Omni desktop](https://github.com/w3f-grants-archive/omni-desktop-prototype) 游댮| User-friendly Wallet based on the [Recovery Pallet](https://github.com/paritytech/substrate/tree/master/frame/recovery)<!-- NO_STATUS_BADGE -->, Web wallets focused on user-onboarding (e.g. using [localStorage](https://github.com/near/near-wallet)<!-- NO_STATUS_BADGE --> ), Enterprise Wallets |
| Browser Extensions     | [Enkrypt](https://github.com/enkryptcom/enKrypt) 游릭, [Polkadot{.js}](https://github.com/polkadot-js/extension) 游릭, [Polkadot-Js-Plus-Extension](https://github.com/Nick-1979/polkadot-Js-Plus-extension) 游릭, [SubWallet-Extension](https://github.com/Koniverse/SubWallet-Extension) 游릭, [Doter](https://github.com/ChainBridgeNetworkTeam/Doter) 游댮, [Enzyme](https://github.com/blockxlabs/enzyme/) 游댮, [Speckle OS](https://github.com/GetSpeckle/speckle-browser-extension) 游댮| Sign-in with your polkadot, kusama, etc. account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

### ink Smart Contracts

| Components      | Existing projects                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Potentially interesting projects   |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------- |
| Bridges         | [Dante Protocol](https://github.com/dantenetwork/protocol-stack-for-ink) 游릭|                                    |
| DeFi            | [Polkadot AMM](https://github.com/realnimish/polkadot-amm) 游댮, [Vera](https://github.com/veradefi/defi) 游리, [Nsure Insurance](https://github.com/nsure-tech/dot-contract) 游댮, [Everlasting Cash](https://github.com/CycanTech/ELC) 游댮, [Coinversation](https://github.com/Coinversation/coinpro) 游댮, [zenlink-dex-contract](https://github.com/zenlinkpro/zenlink-dex-contract) 游댮, [AlgoCash](https://github.com/ReserveLabs/AlgoCash) 游댮| New seigniorage-style stable coins |
| Gaming          | [Open Emoji Battler](https://github.com/OpenEmojiBattler/open-emoji-battler) 游리, [NewOmega](https://github.com/WiktorStarczewski/newomega.polkadot/blob/master/newomega_delegator/newomega/newomega.rs) 游댮|                                    |
| DAO             | [subDAO](https://github.com/SubDAO-Network/subDAO-contracts) 游댮, [RainbowDAO](https://github.com/RainbowcityFoundation/RainbowDAO-Protocol-Ink-milestone_1) 游댮, [MangoBox](https://github.com/Mangoboxlabs/Mangoboxink) 游릭|                                    |
| Spam Protection | [Prosopo](https://github.com/prosopo-io/integration) 游댮|                                    |

| Other            | [Nimbus: Upgradeable consensus framework](https://github.com/PureStake/nimbus) 游릭|

### Networking

| Components          | Existing projects                                                                                                     | Potentially interesting projects |
| ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| DHT crawler         | [Go](https://github.com/atredispartners/dht-crawler-polkadot) 游댮, [Kotlin](https://github.com/emeraldpay/polkabot) 游댮|                                  |
| RPC Tor-like access | [WhiteNoise](https://github.com/Evanesco-Labs/WhiteNoise.rs) 游댮|                                  |

## Contributing

Pull requests, issues, or other contributions from the community are encouraged! You can not only
add specific projects, but also potentially interesting fields/areas which are currently missing in
the tech stack.

:heavy_exclamation_mark: All technologies listed above need to be open-source. Ideally, the links
lead directly to the code.

_Note: You will need a GitHub account to suggest changes or open issues. If you do not have one, you
may [sign up for free](https://github.com/join)._
